mapper.insert: insert into ecs_shaidan (shaidan_id, rec_id, goods_id, user_id, title, add_time, status, hide_username, pay_points, is_points, message) values (#{shaidanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hideUsername,jdbcType=BIT}, #{payPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isPoints,jdbcType=BIT}, #{message,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
